headline: RTX (RTX) Valuation Check After Strong 1 Year Shareholder Return
summary: RTX (RTX) has drawn fresh attention as investors reassess the aerospace and defense group’s recent share performance, with the stock’s past 3 months and one year total returns standing out against its longer term record. See our latest analysis for RTX. RTX’s recent 30 day share price return of 11.28% and 90 day share price return of 12.95% contrast with its already strong 1 year total shareholder return of 68.95%. This suggests momentum has been building on top of longer term gains. If RTX...
